item.title: Uplifting Words from Dougo
item.description: Dougo shares encouraging and positive messages, offering motivation and inspiration in a lighthearted and supportive way.

media:content.media:title: Uplifting Words from Dougo
media:content.media:description: Dougo shares encouraging and positive messages, offering motivation and inspiration in a lighthearted and supportive way.

item.title: Completely Buried on the Farm
item.description: A farm scene where equipment or materials become completely buried, highlighting the challenges of farm work and the techniques used to resolve it safely.

item.title: That’s Not a Good Sign
item.description: A farm moment reveals an unexpected issue, emphasizing observation, problem-solving, and handling challenges safely in everyday agricultural work.

item.title: Purple Pete Troubles
item.description: A lighthearted look at challenges with Purple Pete, highlighting problem-solving, farm tasks, and everyday moments in agricultural life.

item.title: Handling Big Loads on the Farm
item.description: A look at managing large farm loads, showcasing equipment, techniques, and the careful handling required for heavy or bulky materials in agriculture.

item.title: New CAT Tractor Arrives on Site
item.description: A brand-new CAT tractor is delivered to the farm, showcasing equipment setup, features, and the excitement of adding powerful machinery to daily operations.

item.title: A Piercing Stare
item.description: A humorous or dramatic moment highlighting an intense stare, capturing emotion or reaction in a lighthearted and engaging way.

item.title: Why We’re Whispering on the Farm
item.description: A quiet moment on the farm where whispering is needed, showing sensitivity to animals, careful handling of equipment, or maintaining a peaceful environment.

item.title: Farm Accident and Emergency Response
item.description: A farm accident leads to an emergency visit, showing the importance of safety, prompt care, and precautions when working with farm equipment and animals.

item.title: Beautiful Sunrise on the Farm
item.description: A serene sunrise is captured over the farm, highlighting the natural beauty and peaceful start of a day in farm life.

item.title: Farm Equipment Offloading in Action
item.description: Farm equipment and supplies are carefully offloaded, demonstrating techniques and teamwork used to manage heavy machinery safely on the farm.

item.title: First Day Back on the Farm
item.description: A farmhand’s first day back is documented, highlighting the challenges, tasks, and realities of working on a busy farm.

item.title: Maintenance Has Been Overlooked
item.description: A look at equipment that hasn’t received proper upkeep, highlighting the issues found, the repairs needed, and the steps taken to bring it back to reliable working order on the farm.

item.title: 18 Years Old With Only 600 Hours
item.description: A look at an impressive low-hour machine that caught the team’s attention. Highlights its condition, features, and why it was hard to pass up for farm use.

item.title: Dougo Upgrades the Lake House
item.description: A look at the latest improvements made to the lake house, highlighting updates, practical fixes, and the work that goes into keeping the property in great shape.

item.title: Rain Delay Repairs on Worn Equipment
item.description: A look at making repairs during a rain delay as aging equipment needs attention again. Highlights the challenges, the fixes, and the effort to keep farm work moving despite setbacks.

item.title: Putting the New John Deere 830 to the Test
item.description: A first look at how the new John Deere 830 performs in real field conditions, highlighting its features, handling, and how it measures up during a full day of farm work.

item.title: S790 Combine Gets a Track Upgrade
item.description: A look at the S790 combine receiving new tracks, highlighting the installation process, the benefits for field conditions, and how the upgrade prepares the machine for smoother harvest work.

item.title: Time to Plant Beans
item.description: A look at getting bean planting underway, highlighting field conditions, equipment prep, and the steady start to a new phase of the season.

item.title: Combines Don’t Get Along With Digger Shanks
item.description: A look at what happens when a combine encounters a hidden digger shank, highlighting the damage risk, the repair process, and how unexpected obstacles affect harvest days.
